We need to determine if "greens" is a noun, verb, adjective, adverb, pronoun, preposition, conjunction, interjection, article, or something else.

Given that "greens" does not match any common noun words (NN), it doesn't fit as a verb (VB) because verbs require a subject (a person, place, thing, idea, etc.).
